newsitem.title: USA: Core Materials names Kevin Barnett CFO.
newsitem.headline: Core Materials names Kevin Barnett CFO.

text.p: Core Materials Corp said on Tuesday it has elected Kevin Barnett to the position of vice president, treasurer and chief financial officer.
Prior to joining Core Materials, Barnett served as vice president, treasurer and corporate controller at Medex Inc, a medical device company based in Hilliard, Ohio.
Core Materials produces compression sheet molding composite fiberglass-reinforced plastic parts for a variety of applications.
The name of Barnett's predecessor was not immediately available.
